home.cta1: If you are uncertain about your options

description.paragraph1: With over 15 years of experience in international education, immigration, and investment consulting, we are your trusted partner in navigating global opportunities.
description.paragraph2: Our team of certified consultants has helped thousands of individuals and families achieve their dreams of studying, working, and investing abroad. We provide personalized guidance tailored to your unique goals and circumstances.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Get answers to common questions about our services and processes

services.question: What services do you provide?
services.answer: We offer services such as study abroad guidance, work opportunities, investment advice, migration support, mentorship, and job-seeker assistance.

countries.question: Which countries do you work with?
countries.answer: We work with multiple countries including the USA, UK, Canada, Australia, and various European and Asian nations depending on the service requirements.

duration.question: How long does the process take?
duration.answer: The duration varies depending on the type of service. On average, processes can take anywhere from a few weeks to several months.

visa.question: Do you provide visa assistance?
visa.answer: Yes, we assist with visa applications, documentation, and interview preparation to ensure a smooth process.

fees.question: What are your fees?
fees.answer: Our fees depend on the type of service you choose. We provide transparent pricing upfront with no hidden charges.

faq.cta2: Our expert consultants are here to help you with personalized guidance.

poland.heading: Work in Poland
poland.paragraph1: Looking to work in Poland? Start your career in one of Europe's fastest-growing job markets. Poland offers legal job opportunities for both skilled and semi-skilled workers across various industries such as manufacturing, logistics, IT, hospitality, construction, and healthcare. With high demand for foreign workers, Poland remains a top destination for international job seekers.
poland.paragraph2: AtoZ Serwis Plus is your trusted partner for Poland work permits, visa processing, and relocation assistance. We offer verified job contracts, help you apply for the national visa (type D), and ensure all documents meet legal requirements under Polish immigration law.
poland.paragraph3: We guide you step-by-step—from employer matching and documentation to embassy appointments and post-arrival support. Whether you're in Asia, Africa, or already inside the EU, we simplify your path to working legally in Poland.
poland.paragraph4: Find genuine jobs in leading Polish cities like Warsaw, Bydgoszcz, Krakow, Gdansk, and Wroclaw. Choose AtoZ Serwis Plus for professional, secure, and transparent visa and employment services.

step1.imageAlt: Work permit consultation and eligibility check
step1.heading: Step 1: Work Permit Consultation & Eligibility Check
step1.paragraph1: Your journey to legally working in Poland starts with a professional consultation. At AtoZ Serwis Plus, we begin by assessing your nationality, skills, work experience, and job preferences. Based on current labor demand in Poland, we recommend the most suitable job roles and regions where foreign workers are in demand, such as Warsaw, Bydgoszcz, Gdansk, Wroclaw, and Krakow.
step1.paragraph2: We explain your eligibility criteria, estimated processing time, and the success rate of obtaining a Poland work permit and Type D national visa. This helps you make an informed decision before starting your application.
step1.paragraph3: We also provide you with a personalized document checklist, tailored to your profession and country of origin. This ensures your documentation is complete, accurate, and aligned with Polish immigration laws. With our expert guidance at every step, you stay compliant, organized, and one step closer to legally working in Poland.

step2.imageAlt: Employer matching and work permit filing
step2.heading: Step 2: Employer Matching & Work Permit Filing
step2.paragraph1: Once your eligibility is confirmed, we begin the process of matching you with a verified Polish employer from our trusted network. Our team selects job offers based on your skills, qualifications, and the sectors currently facing a labor shortage in Poland—such as logistics, production, hospitality, and construction.
step2.paragraph2: After employer confirmation, we prepare and submit your Poland work permit application (zezwolenie na pracę) through the appropriate Voivodeship Office (Urząd Wojewódzki). Our services include providing a valid job contract, proof of accommodation, and an official invitation letter, all required for your Type D national visa application.
step2.paragraph3: We handle all necessary submissions to Polish authorities, ensuring that your documentation is legally sound and submitted on time. You are continuously updated throughout the process, and we coordinate with your employer to ensure all obligations are fulfilled.
step2.paragraph4: With AtoZ Serwis Plus, the application for a Poland work permit is accurate, compliant, and stress-free—allowing you to focus on preparing for your move to Poland.

step3.imageAlt: Poland work permit approval and visa support
step3.heading: Step 3: Poland Work Permit Approval & Visa Support
step3.paragraph1: After we submit your application to the Polish Voivodeship Office, your Poland work permit is typically approved within 45 to 95 working days, depending on the province and workload. Once approved, we assist you in preparing a complete national visa (Type D) application for submission at the appropriate Polish embassy or consulate in your home country.
step3.paragraph2: We help you schedule your embassy appointment, guide you on the interview process, and ensure all documents are accurate and complete. This includes providing an official cover letter, an employer invitation letter, and all required legal documents.
step3.paragraph3: Our team reviews your full visa file to avoid delays or rejection, ensuring it meets the standards of Polish immigration law. We stay in touch throughout the embassy process to provide updates and support as needed.
step3.paragraph4: With AtoZ Serwis Plus, you benefit from expert visa assistance and timely communication—making the path to working legally in Poland smooth, transparent, and fully compliant.
